CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnUpdate
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
self.time = self.time + delta self:TimeCheck() if self.time >= 10.0 then self.time = 0.0
local PlayerNum = 0 local PlayerList = {} for k, v in pairs(_UserService.UserEntities) do if v.Player.isReady == true then PlayerNum = PlayerNum + 1 PlayerList[#PlayerList+1] = v.Name end end
if PlayerNum >= math.floor(self.playerNumPerGame) then for i = 1, math.floor(PlayerNum / self.playerNumPerGame) do local instanceMap = self:GetOrCreateInstanceMap() local toSendPlayers = {} for j = 1, self.playerNumPerGame do local idx = (i-1) * self.playerNumPerGame + j toSendPlayers[#toSendPlayers+1] = PlayerList[idx] end _InstanceMapService:MoveUsersToInstanceMap(instanceMap.InstanceKey, toSendPlayers) end end end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: GetOrCreateInstanceMap
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- InstanceMapService를 이용해 Instance Map을 생성하고 roomIdx를 1 올려줍니다. -- roomIdx를 Instance Map 을 만드는 키로 사용해 매번 새로운 Instance Map이 만들어지게 합니다. local instanceMap = _InstanceMapService:GetOrCreateInstanceMap("map01"..tostring(self.roomIdx)) self.roomIdx = self.roomIdx + 1 return instanceMap
